::Killfest/Greven/Demise/EndBringer/Scyther/Icarcinator/Prowl/Firearm/
Grimmler/Fliq::

Killfest spins around, managing to dodge most of the ice shots from 
Key, but ending up getting him with a few. It didn't matter too much 
to him, however. In space, you needed less limb movement than in the 
atmosphere, and his internal systems would thaw out the frozen places 
soon enough.

Killfest's eyes slightly widen as he sees all the new reinforcemnts 
that had just arrived (the earth CATs). He growls to himself, firing 
two signature-seeking missiles at Key, followed by two optic blasts 
and an EMP blast. Killfest activates his comm to Ominous Prime.

"You can have the Autobots, but we need some info from Teletran 1 
first. We will not fire at you as long as you do not fire at us," he 
says to Ominous, a laser shot from somewhere in earth's direction 
nearly hitting him. He spins around, seeing a shuttle approaching, 
followed by several others.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incarcinator spins to see several shuttles approaching, aiming at the 
front of one and pulling the trigger of his weapon once (if anyone 
here plays Liero and knows what the Gauss Gun from it is, that's 
pretty much Incarcinator's weapon).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl smiles as the lasers from his shuttle nearly hit Killfest, 
impressed at the aiming of the shuttle. He turns to Firearm, who was 
peering suspiciously at the Pred they had almost hit.

"Hey, this isn-" Prowl didn't get to finish his sentence as a shell 
going at an incredible speed smashes through the front of the shuttle 
he and Firearm were in, barely missing Prowl's head and smashing into 
the back of the shuttle, the explosion shaking the shuttle and 
sending the engines flying out from the back.

"Lets get out of here!" Firearm says, tapping a few buttons. The top 
of the shuttle pops off and Firearm and Prowl jump out, getting as 
much distance as they can before the shuttle behind them explodes in 
a large fireball.

Prowl looks ahead, barely dodging a shot from Incarcinator. "I'll 
take care of him," he says to Firearm, launching off toward 
Incarcinator. Firearm wasn't listening though, he was looking at 
Killfest with wide eyes.

"Killfest!" He exclaims, flying forward. Killfest spins around.

"You.." The Predacon snarls, his voice filled with hatred. He fires 
two missiles at Firearm, which Firearm destroys with two well-aimed 
optic blasts.

Firearm's jetpack slowly brings him closer to Killfest, Killfest's 
bringing him closer to Firearm. "I thought you'd still be floating 
around space," Firearm says, switching his arm cannon to charge 
launcher mode.

Killfest's eyes narrow. "You thought wrong!" he exclaims, his jets 
suddenly boosting him toward Firearm. Killfest wasn't thinking of 
anything else, he just wanted to kill Firearm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther silently flies up beside Dark. He was still invisible to 
optic sensors and scanners. The Predacon raises his scythe, slashing 
it down as hard as he could at Dark's head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer roars as dozens of shots slam into him, making numerous 
dents and cracks in his armor. He spins around, seeing Blue Stinger 
near him and firing two missiles at her. One of his hands reaches 
into a storage compartment, pulling out a heavy-fire rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven and Demise's shuttle flies into range of the battle, firing 
three large laser blasts at Kaiser's head and back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler and Fliq's shuttle also flies into range, firing four laser 
shots at Motormaster.
